Riddle School 2 â€“ Help Phil Escape Riddle Middle School

Riddle School 2 is a comedic point-and-click adventure game where players guide Phil Eggtree through puzzles and challenges to escape his middle school after falling asleep in Music class.

What is Riddle School 2?

Riddle School 2 continues the adventures of Phil Eggtree. Players explore classrooms, interact with characters, and use items like whistles and slide oil to solve puzzles and find the keys needed to escape the school.

How to Play Riddle School 2?

  • Point-and-Click: Click around the environment to examine objects and interact with characters.
  • Collect Items: Pick up useful items and figure out how to use them to solve puzzles.
  • Solve Creative Puzzles: Use logic and humor to progress through the school.
  • Explore the School: Navigate classrooms, hallways, and hidden areas to advance the story.
  • Escape the School: Find keys and complete tasks to finally help Phil escape.

Why Play Riddle School 2 Unblocked?

Enjoy Riddle School 2 online without restrictions. Experience witty dialogue, challenging puzzles, and classic point-and-click gameplay directly in your browser.

Key Features

  • Comedic Adventure: Humorous story and dialogues with memorable characters.
  • Puzzle Solving: Use collected items creatively to overcome obstacles.
  • Exploration: Navigate the school and discover hidden paths.
  • Item Interaction: Combine items and use them strategically to progress.
  • Unblocked Online: Play anywhere instantly in your browser.

Can You Help Phil Escape?

Test your wits in Riddle School 2 by solving puzzles, collecting items, and helping Phil find the keys to escape Riddle Middle School!
